SKT_FIRST.name: Deathly Acrobatics
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy, and has a <color=#28d9ed>25%</color> chance to grant increased <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\nDamage dealt increases when granted <color=#28d9ed>Stealth</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>25%</color>の確率で自分の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPさせる。\nこのスキルは<color=#28d9ed>隠れ身</color>状態の場合、ダメージがUPする。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적 대상을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>25%</color> 확률로 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 증가시킵니다.\n이 스킬은 <color=#28d9ed>은신</color> 보유 시 피해량이 증가합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人目标,并有<color=#28d9ed>25%</color>的几率使自身<color=#28d9ed>攻击力</color>提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。\n附带<color=#28d9ed>隐身</color>效果时,该技能伤害量提升。

SKT_SECOND.name: Curtain of Darkness
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Removes <color=#28d9ed>1</color> debuff(s) from the caster and grants increased <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>, then attacks an enemy. Grants <color=#28d9ed>Stealth</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 自分の弱体効果を<color=#28d9ed>1</color>個解除し、<color=#28d9ed>スピード</color>UP効果を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与した後、敵単体にダメージを与える。自分に<color=#28d9ed>隠れ身</color>効果を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 자신에게 걸려 있는 약화 효과를 <color=#28d9ed>1</color>개 제거하고 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>속도</color> 증가 효과를 부여한 뒤 적 대상을 공격합니다. 자신에게 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>은신</color> 효과를 부여합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh: 解除自身附带的<color=#28d9ed>1</color>个弱化效果,并获得<color=#28d9ed>速度</color>提升效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>后,攻击敌人目标。使自身获得<color=#28d9ed>隐身</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。

5: Removes all debuffs from the caster
5_jp: 自分の弱体効果をすべて解除
5_zh: 解除自身所有弱化效果

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Requiem Serket
SKT_ULTIMATE.name_jp: レクイエム・セルケト
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks an enemy, and when the enemy is killed, grants an <color=#28d9ed>extra turn</color>. When attacking a Boss, ignores <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> of the target's Defense. When granted <color=#28d9ed>Stealth</color>, enemies killed by this skill cannot be Resurrected or Revived.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、敵を倒した場合、<color=#28d9ed>追加ターン</color>を獲得する。対象がボスの場合、防御力を<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>無視する。<color=#28d9ed>隠れ身</color>状態の場合、このスキルで倒れた敵は復活と蘇生ができなくなる。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고, 적을 처치 했을 때 <color=#28d9ed>추가 턴</color>을 획득합니다. 보스 대상으로 공격 시 방어력을 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color>무시 합니다. <color=#28d9ed>은신</color> 보유 중 이 스킬로 사망한 적은 부활 및 소생이 불가능합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并击杀敌人时,获得<color=#28d9ed>额外回合</color>。以首领为目标攻击时,无视<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>的防御力。因该技能死亡且附带<color=#28d9ed>隐身</color>效果的敌人无法触发复活与苏醒效果。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to grant increased <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> chance to grant increased <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(トドメ)</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPさせる。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>の確率で自分の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPさせる。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 피니시 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>이 증가합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> 확률로 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>이 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 증가합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携收尾效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>的几率使全体友军<color=#28d9ed>攻击力</color>提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>的几率使自身<color=#28d9ed>攻击力</color>提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
